text: I know yoʋr works, 2:2 yoʋr 68.5% ¦ --- CT PCK 30%yoʋr labor, and yoʋr endurance. I know that yoʋ cannot tolerate those who are evil, and that yoʋ have tested those who 2:2 declare themselves ¦ say they TRdeclare themselves 2:2 to be 84.8% ¦ are TR 5.8% ¦ --- CT 4.7%to be apostles but are not, and have found them to be false.
